    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleCharsetDetectorBuilder

        public SimpleCharsetDetectorBuilder(P parent,
                                    BuildContext buildContext)
        Initializes the builder with a parent builder. The parent builder is used when calling AbstractParent.and() method. The EnvironmentBuilder is used to evaluate properties when build() method is called.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent builder
        buildContext - for registering instances and property evaluation

    • Method Detail

      • defaultCharset

        public CharsetDetectorBuilder<P> defaultCharset(String charsetName)
        Description copied from interface: CharsetDetectorBuilder
        Set the default Charset that is used by the Java application.

        The value set using this method takes precedence over any property and default value configured using CharsetDetectorBuilder.defaultCharset(). 

         .defaultCharset("UTF-16")
 .defaultCharset()
   .properties("${custom.property.high-priority}", "${custom.property.low-priority}")
   .defaultValue("UTF-8")
 
         .defaultCharset("UTF-16")
 .defaultCharset()
   .properties("${custom.property.high-priority}", "${custom.property.low-priority}")
   .defaultValue("UTF-8")
        In both cases, defaultCharset("UTF-16") is used.

        If this method is called several times, only the last value is used.

        If null value is set, it is like not setting a value at all. The property/default value configuration is applied.

        Specified by:
        defaultCharset in interface CharsetDetectorBuilder<P>
        Parameters:
        charsetName - the charset
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • defaultCharset

        public ConfigurationValueBuilder<CharsetDetectorBuilder<P>,String> defaultCharset()
        Description copied from interface: CharsetDetectorBuilder
        Set the default Charset that is used by the Java application.

        This method is mainly used by Configurers to register some property keys and/or a default value. The aim is to let developer be able to externalize its configuration (using system properties, configuration file or anything else). If the developer doesn't configure any value for the registered properties, the default value is used (if set). 

         .defaultCharset()
   .properties("${custom.property.high-priority}", "${custom.property.low-priority}")
   .defaultValue("UTF-8")

        Non-null value set using CharsetDetectorBuilder.defaultCharset(String) takes precedence over property values and default value. 

         .defaultCharset("UTF-16")
 .defaultCharset()
   .properties("${custom.property.high-priority}", "${custom.property.low-priority}")
   .defaultValue("UTF-8")
        The value "UTF-16" is used regardless of the value of the properties and default value.

        See ConfigurationValueBuilder for more information.

        Specified by:
        defaultCharset in interface CharsetDetectorBuilder<P>
        Returns:
        the builder to configure property keys/default value

        Description copied from interface: Builder
